hero.title: DARTH VINÍCIUS BARBOSA
hero.subtitle: The Dark Side of Software Development is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be... unnatural.
hero.description: "Your lack of faith in your programming skills is... disturbing. But together, we shall master the dark side of code."

about.title: About the Sith Lord
about.subtitle: Know the power behind the code
about.journeyTitle: The journey to the dark side
about.description1: Just as Anakin Skywalker became Darth Vader, my journey in development began with curiosity and evolved into an obsessive passion for code perfection.
about.description2: I master the dark arts of JavaScript, React, and TypeScript. My thirst for knowledge is insatiable, and my dedication to projects is absolute.
about.description3: "Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, and hate leads to perfect code."
about.quote: "You do not know the power of the dark side..."
about.masterDescription: Master at transforming ideas into digital reality, using the power of the dark side of programming.
about.mission: My mission is to use the power of the dark side of programming to create innovative solutions that dominate the digital galaxy.

skills.title: Dark Side Powers
skills.subtitle: "Your destiny is sealed. Your technical abilities, now complete."
skills.quote: "The power of the Force is Unlimited"
skills.description: Always seeking new knowledge and technologies to strengthen my arsenal. The journey to the dark side never ends, nor does my learning.

experiences.title: Imperial Journey
experiences.subtitle: Experiences that shaped the Sith programmer

nordsol.description: Together with my empire, we are developing the company's client referral system.
